abstract: The U.S. Supreme Court said on Tuesday that it would hear an appeal by Merck of a ruling that reinstated a securities fraud lawsuit involving the company’s disclosures to investors about its withdrawn Vioxx pain drug.
snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court said on Tuesday that it would hear an appeal by Merck of a ruling that reinstated a securities fraud lawsuit involving the company’s disclosures to investors about its withdrawn Vioxx pain drug.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court said on Tuesday that it would hear an appeal by Merck of a ruling that reinstated a securities fraud lawsuit involving the company’s disclosures to investors about its withdrawn Vioxx pain drug.

headline.main: U.S. Court to Hear Merck Appeal on Vioxx Investor Suit
